GV01rvpp_05u:882: su-samiddhāya | śociṣe | ghṛtam | tīvram | juhotana | agnaye | jāta-vedase // RV_5,5.1 //
GV01rvpp_05u:883: narāśaṃsaḥ | susūdati | imam | yajñam | adābhyaḥ | kaviḥ | hi | madhu-hastyaḥ // RV_5,5.2 //
GV01rvpp_05u:957: yatra | vettha | vanaspate | devānām | guhyā | nāmāni | tatra | havyāni | gamaya // RV_5,5.10 //
GV01rvpp_05u:1869: arcantaḥ | tvā | havāmahe | arcantaḥ | sam | idhīmahi | agne | arcantaḥ | ūtaye // RV_5,13.1 //
GV01rvpp_05u:1870: agneḥ | stomam | manāmahe | sidhram | adya | divi-spṛśaḥ | devasya | draviṇasyavaḥ // RV_5,13.2 //
GV01rvpp_05u:1918: agnim | stomena | bodhaya | sam-idhānaḥ | amartyam | havyā | deveṣu | naḥ | dadhat // RV_5,14.1 //
GV01rvpp_05u:1919: tam | adhvareṣu | īḷate | devam | martāḥ | amartyam | yajiṣṭham | mānuṣe | jane // RV_5,14.2 //
GV01rvpp_05u:1941: agnim | īḷenyam | kavim | ghṛta-pṛṣṭham | saparyata | vetu | me | ṣṛṇavat | havam // RV_5,14.5 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2281: juhure | vi | citayantaḥ | animiṣam | nṛmṇam | pānti | ā | dṛḷhām | puram | viviśuḥ // RV_5,19.2 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2557: agne | tvam | naḥ | antamaḥ | uta | trātā | śivaḥ | bhava | varūthyaḥ // RV_5,24.1 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2558: vasuḥ | agniḥ | vasu-śravā | accha | nakṣi | dyumat-tamam | rayim | dāḥ // RV_5,24.2 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2559: saḥ | naḥ | bodhi | śrudhi | havam | uruṣya | naḥ | agha-yataḥ | samasmāt // RV_5,24.3 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2560: tam | tvā | śociṣṭha | dīdi-vaḥ | sumnāya | nūnam | īmahe | sakhi-bhyaḥ // RV_5,24.4 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2686: agne | pāvaka | rociṣā | mandrayā | deva | jihvayā | ā | devān | vakṣi | yakṣi | ca // RV_5,26.1 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2697: vīti-hotram | tvā | kave | dyu-mantam | sam | idhīmahi | agne | bṛhantam | adhvare // RV_5,26.3 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2707: yajamānāya | sunvate | ā | agne | su-vīrya | vaha | devaiḥ | ā | satsi | barhiṣi // RV_5,26.5 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2710: sam-idhanaḥ | sahasra-jit | agne | dharmāṇi | puṣyasi | devānām | dūtaḥ | ukthyaḥ // RV_5,26.6 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2711: ni | agnim | jāta-vedasam | hotra-vāham | yaviṣṭhyam | dadhāta | devam | ṛtvijam // RV_5,26.7 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2712: pra | yajñaḥ | etu | ānuṣak | adya | devavyacaḥ-tamaḥ | stṛṇīta | barhiḥ | āsade // RV_5,26.8 //
GV01rvpp_05u:2890: ā | juhota | duvasyata | agnim | pra-yati | adhvare | vṛṇīdhvam | havya-vāhanam // RV_5,28.6 //
GV01rvpp_05u:4721: yat | indra | citra | mehanā | asti | tvādātam | adri-vaḥ | rādhaḥ | tat | naḥ | vidadvaso
GV01rvpp_05u:5523: suṣṭutiḥ stanayantaṃ ruvantam iḷas patiñ jaritar nūnam aśyāḥ |
GV01rvpp_05u:5524: yo abdimāṃm iyartipra vidyutā rodasī ukṣamāṇaḥ // RV_5,42.14 //
GV01rvpp_05u:6919: agne | sutasya | pītaye | viśvaiḥ | ūmebhiḥ | ā | gahi | devebhiḥ | havya-dātaye // RV_5,51.1 //
GV01rvpp_05u:6920: ṛta-dhītayaḥ | ā | gata | satya-dharmāṇaḥ | adhvaram | agneḥ | pibata | jihvayā // RV_5,51.2 //
GV01rvpp_05u:6921: viprebhiḥ | vipra | santya | prātaryāva-bhiḥ | ā | gahi | devebhiḥ | soma-pītaye // RV_5,51.3 //
GV01rvpp_05u:7454: iti | it | sumnam | astu | vaḥ // RV_5,53.9 //
GV01rvpp_05u:7478: kasmai | adya | su-jātāya | rāta-havyāya | pra | yayuḥ | enā | yāmena | marutaḥ // RV_5,53.12 //
GV01rvpp_05u:7938: na | parvatāḥ | na | nadyaḥ | varanta | vaḥ | yatra | acidhvam | marutaḥ | gacchatha | it | oṃ
GV01rvpp_05u:8756: jaghane | codaḥ | eṣām | vi | sakthāni | naraḥ | yamuḥ | putra-kṛthe | na | janayaḥ // RV_5,61.3 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8757: parā | vīrāsaḥ | itana | maryāsaḥ | bhadra-jānayaḥ | agni-tapaḥ | yathā | asatha // RV_5,61.4 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8772: uta | tvā | strī | śaśīyasī | puṃsaḥ | bhavati | vasyasī | adeva-trāt | arādhasaḥ // RV_5,61.6 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8849: kaḥ | veda | nūnam | eṣām | yatra | madanti | dhūtayaḥ | ṛta-jātāḥ | arepasaḥ // RV_5,61.14 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8850: yūyam | martam | vipanyavaḥ | pra-netāraḥ | itthā | dhiyā | śrotāraḥ | yāma-hūtiṣu // RV_5,61.15 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8853: te | naḥ | vasūni | kāmyā | puru-candrāḥ | riśādasaḥ | ā | yajñiyāsaḥ | vavṛttana // RV_5,61.16 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8854: etam | me | stomam | ūrmye | dārbhyāya | parā | vaha | giraḥ | devi | rathīḥ-iva // RV_5,61.17 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8855: uta | me | vocatāt | iti | suta-some | ratha-vītau | na | kāmaḥ | apa | veti | me // RV_5,61.18 //
GV01rvpp_05u:8856: eṣaḥ | kṣeti | ratha-vītiḥ | magha-vā | go--matīḥ | anu | parvateṣu | apa-śritaḥ // RV_5,61.19 //
GV01rvpp_05u:9465: pra | vaḥ | mitrāya | gāyata | varuṇāya | vipā | girā | mahi-kṣatrau | ṛtam | bṛhat // RV_5,68.1 //
GV01rvpp_05u:9488: ṛtam | ṛtena | sapantā | iṣiram | dakṣam | āśāteiti | adruhā | devau | vardheteiti // RV_5,68.4 //
GV01rvpp_05u:9626: viśvasya | hi | pra-cetasā | varuṇa | mitra | rājathaḥ | īśānā | pipyatam | dhiyaḥ // RV_5,71.2 //
GV01rvpp_05u:9627: upa | naḥ | sutam | ā | gatam | varuṇa | mitra | dāśuṣaḥ | asya | somasya | pītaye // RV_5,71.3 //
GV01rvpp_05u:10846: anāgasaḥ | aditaye | devasya | savituḥ | save | viśvā | vāmāni | dhīmahi // RV_5,82.6 //
GV01rvpp_05u:10847: ā | viśva-devam | sat-patim | su-uktaiḥ | adya | vṛṇīmahe | satya-savam | savitāram // RV_5,82.7 //
GV01rvpp_05u:10858: yaḥ | imā | viśvā | jātāni | āśrāvayati | ślokena | pra | ca | suvāti | savitā // RV_5,82.9 //
